newsitem.title: LATVIA: Latvian shares mixed, Unibanka steady.
newsitem.headline: Latvian shares mixed, Unibanka steady.

text.p: Share trade volumes on the Latvian stock exchange were stable on Wednesday and market leader Unibanka was unchanged, the stock exchange said.
Overall volume was 100,372 lats and Unibanka traded 61,973 lats, remaining at 2.15 lats.
But most of the other active shares dipped, with Riga Transport Fleet ending down 6.54 percent at one lat on turnover of 5,804 lats.
The Daugavpils machine factory, which rocketed higher yesterday had an equally spectacular reverse today, ending 14.63 percent lower at 70 santimes on heavy trade of 16,487 lats.
Also on the secondary list, the Kaija fish cannery fell to 1.10 lats from 1.23 lats on turnover of 4,119 lats.
But the Riga yeast plant was a gainer, ending at 1.61 lats after 1.40 on turnover of 5,474 lats.
